line.token: * Create a new SetCookie object from a string.
// Explode the cookie string using a series of semicolons
// The name of the cookie (first kvp) must exist and include an equal sign.
// Add the cookie pieces into the parsed data array
// Only check for non-cookies when cookies have been found
* @param array $data Array of cookie data provided by a Cookie parser
/** @var array|null $replaced will be null in case of replace error */
'Unable to replace the default values for the Cookie.'
// Extract the Expires value and turn it into a UNIX timestamp if needed
'Not passing a string to %s::%s() is deprecated and will cause an error in 8.0.'
'Not passing a string to %s::%s() is deprecated and will cause an error in 8.0.'
* Set the domain of the cookie.
'Not passing a string or null to %s::%s() is deprecated and will cause an error in 8.0.'
* Set the path of the cookie.
'Not passing a string to %s::%s() is deprecated and will cause an error in 8.0.'
* Maximum lifetime of the cookie in seconds.
* Set the max-age of the cookie.
* @param int|null $maxAge Max age of the cookie in seconds
'Not passing an int or null to %s::%s() is deprecated and will cause an error in 8.0.'
* The UNIX timestamp when the cookie Expires.
* Set the unix timestamp for which the cookie will expire.
* @param int|string|null $timestamp Unix timestamp or any English textual datetime description.
'Not passing an int, string or null to %s::%s() is deprecated and will cause an error in 8.0.'
* Get whether or not this is a secure cookie.
* Set whether or not the cookie is secure.
* @param bool $secure Set to true or false if secure
'Not passing a bool to %s::%s() is deprecated and will cause an error in 8.0.'
* Get whether or not this is a session cookie.
* Set whether or not this is a session cookie.
* @param bool $discard Set to true or false if this is a session cookie
'Not passing a bool to %s::%s() is deprecated and will cause an error in 8.0.'
* Get whether or not this is an HTTP only cookie.
* Set whether or not this is an HTTP only cookie.
* @param bool $httpOnly Set to true or false if this is HTTP only
'Not passing a bool to %s::%s() is deprecated and will cause an error in 8.0.'
* Check if the cookie matches a path value.
* A request-path path-matches a given cookie-path if at least one of
* - The cookie-path and the request-path are identical.
* - The cookie-path is a prefix of the request-path, and the last
* - The cookie-path is a prefix of the request-path, and the first
* character of the request-path that is not included in the cookie-
// Match on exact matches or when path is the default empty "/"
// Ensure that the cookie-path is a prefix of the request path.
// Match if the last character of the cookie-path is "/"
// Match if the first character not included in cookie path is "/"
* Check if the cookie matches a domain value.
// Remove the leading '.' as per spec in RFC 6265.
// Domain not set or exact match.
// Matching the subdomain according to RFC 6265.
* Check if the cookie is expired.
* Check if the cookie is valid according to RFC 6265.
* @return bool|string Returns true if valid or an error message if invalid
'The cookie name must not be empty'
// Check if any of the invalid characters are present in the cookie name
'Cookie name must not contain invalid characters: ASCII '
// Value must not be null. 0 and empty string are valid. Empty strings
// are technically against RFC 6265, but known to happen in the wild.
'The cookie value must not be empty'
// Domains must not be empty, but can be 0. "0" is not a valid internet
// domain, but may be used as server name in a private network.
'The cookie domain must not be empty'
